subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Restoration and Rehabilitation
Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Josh Hamilton, first pick in the 1999 draft, spent four years out of baseball recovering from a cocaine addiction before rejoining a minor league team on Monday.
snippet: Josh Hamilton, first pick in the 1999 draft, spent four years out of baseball recovering from a cocaine addiction before rejoining a minor league team on Monday.
